
                        ALGORITMO DES DE CRIPTOGRAFIA


    TEXTO PLANO

Plain Text in Upercase: RODOLFO

Plain Text in Hex: 524F444F4C464F

Blocos Parciais Hexadecimais do Texto Puro:
	0 - 524F444F4C464F00



    CHAVE

Key in Hexadecimal used for encryption: 0123000000000000

Key in Binary used for encryption: 00000001 00100011 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000
